import React,{useState} from "react"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import ppl from "../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/people.png"; import clndr from "../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/month.png"; import time from "../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/clock.png"; import tour from "../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/tour.png"; import transport from "../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/transport.png"; import search from "../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/search.png"; import about from "../assets/home/about.png"; import bike from '../assets/home/service/service_bike.png'; import guide from '../assets/home/service/service_guide.png'; import taxi from '../assets/home/service/service_taxi.png' import bus from '../assets/home/service/service_bus.png' import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import BookBike from '../components/bookBike'; import Statistic from '../components/statistic'; import Tuscany from '../DB/Tuscany.json'; import Tour_Packages from '../pages/Tour_Packages' import Select from 'react-select'; import home from '../styles/home.css' export default function Home () { const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()); const [selectedOption,setSelectedOption] = useState(null); const options = [ {value:'1:00 a.m',label:'1:00 a.m.'}, {value:'2:00 a.m',label:'2:00 a.m.'}, {value:'3:00 a.m',label:'3:00 a.m.'}, {value:'4:00 a.m',label:'4:00 a.m.'}, {value:'5:00 a.m',label:'5:00 a.m.'} ]; const optionsTour= [ {value:'Lucca Bike Tour',label:'Lucca Bike Tour'}, {value:'Wine tasting in Tuscany',label:'Wine tasting in Tuscany'}, {value:'Cinque Terre Tour', label:'Cinque Terre Tour'}, {value:'Sienna and Surroundings',label:'Sienna and Surroundings'}, {value:'Tour of the Lucaa Hills',label:'Tour of the Lucaa Hills'}, {value:'Verona',label:'Verona'}, {value:'Pisa',label:'Pisa'}, {value:'Florence',label:'Florence'} ] const optionsTransport = [ {value:'Minivan and Bus',label:'Minivan and Bus'}, {value:'Transfers & NCC',label:'Transfers & NCC'}, {value:'Luxury Experience',label:'Luxury Experience'} ] const numberOfPeople = [ {value:'5-10',label:'5-10'}, {value:'5-12',label:'5-12'}, {value:'10-50',label:'10-50'}, ] return( <>

welcome to our site!

We are the best company for your visit

After decades of experience, and a whole life in Lucca, we offer you the most complete tourism service in the city. In addition to having bikes and rickshaws to have as much fun as you want, you have the choice of tour guides with whom to tour and drivers for your every need! We offer packages in the way that you get the most at the lowest price. Book with us and we will always be available for you!

{/* */}

Bike and rickshaw rental

Book your quality vehicle quickly for an hour or all day!

Guided tour of the countryside

Live the real Lucchese experience by visiting the suburbs by bike!

Taxi and NCC service

Do you need not only a bike but also a driver? Then you have found the right place!

Bus Package

Do you need not only a bike but also a driver? Then you have found the right place!
